welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mestre, Italy! Get ready to discover the charm of this vibrant city, known for its historic architecture, delicious cuisine, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mestre has to offer. Buon viaggio!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the free WiFi for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at S. Angelo Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
